doc.field: - Anitec Image Technology Corp is raising 75 mln dlrs via an issue of convertible subordinated debentures due 2012 with a 5-7/8 pct coupon and par pricing, said lead manager Smith Barney, Harris Upham and Co Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 32 dlrs a share, representing a 26.73 pct premium over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for two years, the debentures are rated B-2 by Moody's and B by Standard and Poor's. Donaldson Lufkin, Salomon Brothers and Mabon Nugent co-managed the issue, which was increased from an initial offering of 60 mln dlrs.
